text: "Summer Wine" is a seductive ballad. It was originally sung by Suzi Jane Hokom and Lee Hazlewood in 1966. It was made famous when released by Nancy Sinatra and Lee Hazlewood in 1967. The song is about a man who meets a woman who notices his silver spurs. She invites him to have wine with her. The song was recorded by other musicians since it was first played. Category:1967 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs about sexuality Category:Nancy Sinatra songs Category:Demis Roussos songs
title: Summer Wine
